description:
Whether you’re looking to get more serious about your road riding, spice up your commute, or head out on weekend tours the Synapse is ready to roll. Kitted out with Shimano’s dependable Tiagra groupset, you get crisp, confident shifts and precise velocity control. Little touches like hidden rack mounts, a removeable fender bridge and clearance for larger tires, even give you the option to explore the roads less traveled.

  • SmartSense™ ready frame is prewired to accept Cannondale’s SmartSense battery, lighting, and radar systems (sold separately)
  • Light and strong carbon frame and fork is nimble, yet comfortable
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Removable fender bridge and stealthy rack/fender mounts, and room for up to 35mm tires, give this frame touring versatility
  • Proportional response size lets riders of all sizes enjoy the same aggressive road geometry
  • Shimano Tiagra hydraulic disc brakes keep your speed right where you want it
  • 2x10 drivetrain pairs 50-34T chain rings with an 11-34T cassette
  • Shimano Tiagra groupset
  • Vittoria Zaffiro Pro reflective tires help keep you seen and have low rolling resistance
  • Wheel sensor pairs with your phone via the free Cannondale app and uses Garmin™ technology to record your rides, provide your: time, speed, distance, calories, etc. and it even tells you about your carbon offset. The app also provides reminders for needed services, tracks service history and more
  • Wheel sensor works with ANT+® or Bluetooth® and uses an easily replaceable 2032 battery that lasts more than a year
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Synapse Carbon 4 Bicycle - Unisex
